title: João da Silva (boxer)
text: João da Silva (1 January 1946 – 12 March 1982) was a Brazilian <a href="boxing">boxer</a>. He competed in the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201964%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Light%20welterweight">men's light welterweight</a> event at the <a href="1964%20Summer%20Olympics">1964 Summer Olympics</a>. At the 1964 Summer Olympics, he defeated <a href="Chang%20Pin-cheng">Chang Pin-cheng</a> and <a href="Nadimi%20Ghasre%20Dashti">Nadimi Ghasre Dashti</a>, before losing to <a href="Eddie%20Blay">Eddie Blay</a>.
